text: aur isi tarah hum ne aap ki taraf apne hukm se ruh ko utaara hai, aap us se pehle ye bhi nahi jaante thein ke kitaab aur imaan kya cheez hai? lekin hum ne ose noor banaya, us ke zariye se apne bandho mein se jise chaahte hai hidaayath dete hai, beshak aap raahe raasth ki rehnumaayi kar rahe hai
